title: Self Study Content
description: Track your learning journey and complete your sessions step by step.

course.courseDescription: This is the official course for your grade this term. When you complete it, you will automatically move to the next course.

lesson.title: Lesson
lesson.quizPassedDescription: You've mastered this video. Ready for the next one?
lesson.quizFailedDescription: Watch the video again and try the quiz once more.
lesson.noAttemptsLeft: No attempts remaining. Please rewatch the video.
lesson.finishVideoFirst: Finish watching the video first to unlock the quiz
lesson.passQuizToUnlock: Pass the previous quiz to unlock this video
lesson.comeBackTomorrow: You have used all 3 attempts for this quiz. Your attempts will reset tomorrow. Please come back then to try again.
lesson.noAssignments: No assignments available for this lesson.
lesson.noMaterials: No materials available for this lesson.
